Hello Patrick,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00423776. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00423776
Ticket Subject: device is marked as blocked but functioning
Ticket Details: we use a new rfid-reader and this device is marked as blocked in device-control. as we need this device it is cool, that is working and not blocked. there seems to a glitch interpreting ist status.

Thank you!
